Phrase.Text: You again, [YourLeaderName]? I mean, really... have the humans nothing better to do than to follow us around the galaxy? Mark my words, death is all you'll find in this quadrant.

So you have decided to remain. This quadrant will be your death bed, [YourLeaderName].
#You risk much for such a small section of the galaxy... or are you here for more than the expansion of your puny empire? Either way, your destruction is all you will find here.
#We will hold Ixith and drive you from this quadrant, filthy human. Your death awaits.
#Our forces stand strong as your's falter and die. I told you humans were too weak for this quadrant of space. But did you listen to me? Oh, no. You knew it all, didn't you?

Ixith will not fall easily, human.
#Your forces may be strong in this quadrant, but we will hold Ixith without fail.
#Ah, [YourLeaderName]. Intruding on my trade screen like you intruded into this quadrant. Make it quick, human.
#Your persistence is honorable, human, but you will never take the Drengin world of Ixith.
